name: SACRIFICE UNKNOWN
description:
"Sacrifice Unknown" is about a terrible ritual that you are witnessing. You have the right to spare the victim or kill her, you can do nothing at all, the choice is yours.

YOU HAVE ONLY 1 MINUTE TO DECIDE THE FATE OF THE GIRL!

The game has seven endings at the moment.

Use you mouse to enteract with objects.

Your interactions will affect the end of the game.

Created specifically for TWO-MINUTE HORROR JAM.
